Hero.description: We help companies prevent moisture-related losses in shipping and storage through data-driven analysis, tailored strategies, and efficient protection products.

MoistureDamage.title: Moisture damage is costly and preventable
MoistureDamage.description: From container rain to collapsed packaging, moisture silently threatens your cargo. We help you stop damage before it starts.

Prevention.title: Prevention backed by data, not guesswork
Prevention.description: We use Dryon to measure your cargo's actual moisture risk. Then we recommend the most efficient solution — including which product and how much to use.

Sustainability.title: Less damage. Less waste. Lower impact.
Sustainability.description: When you prevent damage, you reduce reshipping, packaging waste, and emissions. We help companies meet sustainability goals through smarter moisture protection.

ProductsPage.introDescription: Our complete product range of moisture-control and cargo protection solutions are designed for safeguarding the valuable cargo from condensation, container rain, mold, fungus, decay, lumps, odours, discoloration, rust and corrosion during packaging, storage, and long sea voyages.

ProductsPage.whatIsDesiccantDescription: A desiccant is a moisture absorbent which is used to reduce the humidity inside the packaging, storage and shipping containers. It works by absorbing the excess moisture from the air and protect the goods from condensation, mold, decay, lumps, aflatoxin, odour and other moisture-related problems. It is widely used across various industries in the form of container desiccants or in-box desiccants.

AboutPage.title: About DryOn
AboutPage.subtitle: Leading the fight against moisture damage since 2010
AboutPage.storyP1: Founded in 2010, DryOn emerged from a simple observation: billions of dollars worth of cargo was being lost to preventable moisture damage every year. Our founders, a team of logistics experts and materials scientists, set out to change that.
AboutPage.storyP2: Today, we're the trusted partner of over 5,000 companies worldwide, protecting everything from electronics to pharmaceuticals, from furniture to food products. Our data-driven approach and innovative solutions have prevented over $500 million in cargo losses.
AboutPage.missionDesc: To eliminate cargo loss due to moisture damage through innovation, education, and sustainable solutions.
AboutPage.visionDesc: A world where every shipment arrives in perfect condition, reducing waste and environmental impact.
AboutPage.teamDesc: 50+ dedicated professionals across engineering, logistics, and customer success, all committed to protecting your cargo.

ContactPage.title: Contact Us

DamagePreventionPage.title: Damage Prevention
DamagePreventionPage.subtitle: Comprehensive solutions to protect your cargo from moisture damage
DamagePreventionPage.heroSubtitle: Understanding moisture damage is the first step to prevention. Explore the common challenges faced during ocean cargo transportation and discover our proven solutions.
DamagePreventionPage.problemP1: Every year, billions of dollars worth of cargo is damaged or destroyed due to moisture-related issues during ocean shipping. From container rain to mold growth, these preventable problems affect industries worldwide.
DamagePreventionPage.problemP2: The good news? Over 90% of moisture damage is preventable with proper understanding and the right protection solutions. Below, we break down the most common moisture challenges and how DryON products address each one.
DamagePreventionPage.challengesSubtitle: Explore each problem to understand its causes, effects, and our recommended maritime cargo protection solution.
DamagePreventionPage.containerRainDesc: When warm, moist air inside a shipping container meets the cold steel walls, condensation forms and drips onto cargo like rain.
DamagePreventionPage.containerRainSolutionDesc: Our calcium chloride-based container desiccants absorb up to 300% of their weight in moisture, preventing condensation before it forms.
DamagePreventionPage.moldMildewDesc: Fungal growth thrives in humid environments, spreading rapidly across organic materials and contaminating entire shipments.
DamagePreventionPage.moldMildewSolutionDesc: Placed directly with products, Super DryON maintains safe humidity levels within cartons and prevents fungal growth at the source.
DamagePreventionPage.rustCorrosionDesc: Metal components and machinery suffer irreversible damage when exposed to moisture, leading to costly replacements and repairs.
DamagePreventionPage.rustCorrosionSolutionDesc: Combining our desiccants with Vapor Corrosion Inhibitor packaging provides comprehensive metal protection during transit.
DamagePreventionPage.cargoSweatDesc: When cargo temperature is lower than the dew point of surrounding air, moisture condenses directly on product surfaces.
DamagePreventionPage.cargoSweatCause1: Cold cargo loaded in warm environments
DamagePreventionPage.cargoSweatSolutionDesc: Our hermetic liners create a protective barrier around cargo, controlling the micro-environment and preventing moisture exchange.
DamagePreventionPage.odorContaminationDesc: Musty odors develop from moisture-related bacterial and fungal activity, permanently affecting product appeal and saleability.
DamagePreventionPage.odorContaminationSolutionDesc: Beyond moisture control, FreshON absorbs ethylene and odors, keeping products fresh and market-ready upon arrival.
DamagePreventionPage.clumpingCakingDesc: Powdered and granular products absorb moisture and bind together, making them unusable and impossible to sell.
DamagePreventionPage.clumpingCakingSolutionDesc: Our eco-friendly desiccant sachets placed within product packaging maintain optimal moisture levels throughout the supply chain.
DamagePreventionPage.processBadge: How We Protect Your Maritime Cargo
DamagePreventionPage.processSubtitle: A systematic approach to identify, address, and prevent moisture damage in your ocean supply chain.
DamagePreventionPage.step1Desc: We analyze your cargo type, route, transit duration, and seasonal conditions to identify specific moisture risks.
DamagePreventionPage.step2Desc: Our experts design a customized protection strategy combining the right products in optimal quantities.
DamagePreventionPage.step3Desc: We guide proper installation and provide training to ensure consistent, effective protection.
DamagePreventionPage.benefit1Desc: Safeguard cargo from all moisture-related damage
DamagePreventionPage.benefit2Desc: Prevent losses that far exceed protection costs
DamagePreventionPage.benefit4Desc: Minimize claims, rejections, and reputation damage
DamagePreventionPage.industriesSubtitle: Moisture damage impacts virtually every industry involved in ocean shipping and storage. Here are the sectors where protection is most critical.
DamagePreventionPage.ctaTitle: Ready to Protect Your Maritime Cargo?
DamagePreventionPage.ctaDescription: Let our experts analyze your specific ocean shipping needs and create a customized protection plan that eliminates moisture damage from your supply chain.

SolutionsByIndustryPage.subtitle: Tailored moisture protection solutions designed for your specific industry needs
SolutionsByIndustryPage.ctaDescription: Our experts can design a moisture protection plan tailored to your specific industry requirements.

HowItWorks.title: How DryON Works
HowItWorks.subtitle: Protecting your cargo from moisture damage is easier than you think. Here's our simple 4-step process.
HowItWorks.step1Desc: Select the right desiccant type based on your cargo, container size, and voyage duration.
HowItWorks.step2Desc: Simply hang or place the desiccant bags inside your container before loading cargo.
HowItWorks.step3Desc: Our desiccants actively absorb moisture throughout the entire voyage, preventing damage.
HowItWorks.step4Desc: Your goods arrive dry, fresh, and damage-free, ready for the market.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our moisture control solutions. Can't find what you're looking for? Our team is here to help.
FAQ.expertsReady: Our experts are ready to help
FAQ.q1: What is a desiccant and how does it work?
FAQ.a1: A desiccant is a moisture-absorbing material that reduces humidity inside packaging, storage, or shipping containers. It works by absorbing excess moisture from the air, protecting goods from condensation, mold, decay, and other moisture-related damage.
FAQ.q2: How much desiccant do I need for my container?
FAQ.a2: The quantity depends on several factors: cargo type, container size, voyage duration, and route climate. As a general rule, we recommend 8-16 units of DryON Container Desiccant per 20ft container. Our experts can provide exact recommendations based on your specific needs.
FAQ.q3: Are DryON products safe for food cargo?
FAQ.a3: Yes! All DryON products are DMF-Free, non-toxic, and compliant with international food safety standards. Our desiccants are specifically designed to protect food products during transit without any risk of contamination.
FAQ.q4: How long do DryON desiccants remain effective?
FAQ.a4: DryON Container Desiccants remain effective for up to 60-90 days, depending on humidity conditions. This covers most standard shipping routes. For longer voyages, we recommend additional units or our extended-life products.
FAQ.a5: Our products are used across diverse industries including agriculture, dry fruits, textile and apparel, leather goods, processed food, canned items, engineering goods, automotive, and transportation & logistics.
FAQ.q6: Do you offer bulk pricing for large orders?
FAQ.a6: Absolutely! We offer competitive bulk pricing for large orders and can create custom packaging solutions for high-volume clients. Contact our sales team for a personalized quote based on your requirements.

AboutPage.title: About DryOn
AboutPage.subtitle: Leading the fight against moisture damage since 2010
AboutPage.heroSubtitle: Pakistan's leading manufacturer and exporter of moisture-control and cargo-protection solutions
AboutPage.overviewP1: DryON is a leading manufacturer and exporter of moisture-control and cargo-protection solutions in Pakistan. We specialize in high-performance calcium chloride–based desiccants, and TransafeLiners using Hermetic Technology used across warehousing, export, and logistics industries to safeguard the valuable cargo from moisture damage during long sea voyages.
AboutPage.overviewP2: We collaborated with global technology partners from China and Europe and invested in advanced testing capabilities, including an EU-grade environmental chamber. This allows us to simulate real-time extreme humidity and temperature conditions and ensure every DryON product performs reliably throughout the transit.
AboutPage.overviewP3: All our products are proudly manufactured in Pakistan, supporting the domestic-led industrialization while maintaining international-standard quality.
AboutPage.achievement1Desc: Leading manufacturer and exporter in Pakistan for sustainable and high-performance moisture-control solutions for long sea voyages.
AboutPage.achievement2Desc: Recognized for our contribution to moisture damage prevention solutions and supply-chain improvement.
AboutPage.achievement3Desc: Recognized by leading exporters and manufacturers worldwide for our reliability and quality standards.
AboutPage.achievement4Desc: Environmental-chamber testing facility enabling real-time shipping challenges simulation under extreme conditions.
AboutPage.storyP1: DryON was founded with an objective to solve one of the most common yet costly problems in global trade: moisture damage in shipping containers during long sea voyages. We want to offer a cost-effective yet reliable way to exporters, manufacturers and supply chain professionals to protect their valuable cargo from moisture damage that causes product refusal, financial loss, and quality worsening.
AboutPage.storyP2: With increasing demand for the reliable and sustainable moisture control solutions in Pakistan's export sector, DryON introduced globally trusted calcium chloride-based desiccants to the local market and committed in eliminating container rain, condensation, mould, musty odour, contamination and decay in shipping containers during transit.
AboutPage.storyP3: Over the years, DryON has grown into a well-known brand for product performance, strict quality control, and consistent support to exporters and logistics industry. Our journey continues as we expand our product line and strengthen our role in protecting global cargo shipments through innovative active packaging solutions.
AboutPage.officialRegistered: We are officially registered with the Government of Pakistan and an active member of the Chamber of Commerce, which further ensures transparency, compliance, and trust in all our business practices.
AboutPage.sustainabilityDesc: We are committed to sustainable business practices, minimizing our environmental footprint while delivering world-class moisture protection solutions.
AboutPage.solarPoweredDesc: Our entire manufacturing facility runs on renewable solar energy, significantly reducing our carbon footprint.
AboutPage.treePlantationDesc: Active participation in tree plantation drives to offset carbon emissions and contribute to a greener Pakistan.
AboutPage.recycledPlasticDesc: Our packaging incorporates 30% recycled plastic materials, reducing virgin plastic consumption.
AboutPage.circularEconomyDesc: Committed to circular economy principles with waste reduction, recycling, and sustainable resource management.
AboutPage.greenerDesc: At DryON, sustainability isn't just a buzzword – it's embedded in our operations. From solar-powered manufacturing to recycled materials, we're actively working towards reducing our environmental impact while delivering premium quality products.
AboutPage.complianceDesc: Our products meet and exceed international standards, ensuring safety, quality, and environmental responsibility.
AboutPage.storyP1: Founded in 2010, DryOn emerged from a simple observation: billions of dollars worth of cargo was being lost to preventable moisture damage every year. Our founders, a team of logistics experts and materials scientists, set out to change that.
AboutPage.storyP2: Today, we're the trusted partner of over 5,000 companies worldwide, protecting everything from electronics to pharmaceuticals, from furniture to food products. Our data-driven approach and innovative solutions have prevented over $500 million in cargo losses.
AboutPage.missionDesc: To provide reliable, sustainable, and cost-effective moisture protection solutions that safeguard valuable cargo during transit, enabling Pakistani exporters to compete confidently in global markets while eliminating moisture-related losses.
AboutPage.visionDesc: To become the most trusted name in cargo protection across South Asia, pioneering innovation in moisture control technology while supporting Pakistan's export growth and sustainable industrial development.
AboutPage.teamDesc: 50+ dedicated professionals across engineering, logistics, and customer success, all committed to protecting your cargo.
AboutPage.partnerDryON: Partner with DryON for reliable moisture protection solutions trusted by exporters across Pakistan.

CSRPage.title: Our CSR Commitment
CSRPage.subtitle: Building a better tomorrow through ethical business practices and meaningful social impact
CSRPage.mainP1: At DryON, we are actively pursuing our Corporate Social Responsibility goals by supporting numerous social and sustainable ventures. Our commitment extends across a wide spectrum of initiatives, ranging from supporting orphans and community welfare programs to startup mentorships, interest-free lending, and comprehensive worker and employee welfare programs.
CSRPage.mainP2: We believe that business success and social responsibility go hand in hand. Through our diverse CSR initiatives, we aim to create lasting positive change in the communities we serve while maintaining the highest standards of ethical business conduct.
CSRPage.principle: SMART WORK (KHUDI) + PHILANTHROPY = ETHICAL & SMART BUSINESS
CSRPage.principleDesc: This principle guides every decision we make and every action we take, ensuring that our business growth is always aligned with positive social impact.
CSRPage.initiativesDesc: We are committed to making a meaningful difference across multiple areas of social responsibility
CSRPage.initiative1Desc: Providing care, education, and support to orphaned children, ensuring they have access to essential resources and opportunities for a brighter future.
CSRPage.initiative2Desc: Engaging in various community development initiatives that uplift local communities and improve quality of life for families across Pakistan.
CSRPage.initiative3Desc: Empowering the next generation of entrepreneurs through mentorship programs, providing guidance, resources, and support to help startups thrive.
CSRPage.initiative4Desc: Offering interest-free financial assistance to individuals and small businesses, enabling economic empowerment and sustainable growth.
CSRPage.initiative5Desc: Prioritizing the well-being of our workforce through comprehensive welfare programs, fair practices, and initiatives that support their families.
CSRPage.initiative6Desc: Supporting and investing in sustainable business ventures that create positive social and environmental impact while generating economic value.
CSRPage.commitmentDesc: At DryON, we firmly believe that sustainable business success is built on a foundation of ethical practices and genuine care for our community. Our CSR initiatives reflect our dedication to creating a positive impact that extends far beyond our business operations.
CSRPage.commitment1Desc: Conducting business with integrity, transparency, and respect for all stakeholders
CSRPage.commitment2Desc: Creating meaningful change in communities through targeted social initiatives
CSRPage.commitment3Desc: Building a business model that balances profit with purpose and long-term value
CSRPage.partnerDesc: Interested in learning more about our CSR initiatives or partnering with us on a social project? We'd love to hear from you.

RDPage.title: Research & Development
RDPage.subtitle: Pioneering innovation through continuous research and indigenous resource utilization
RDPage.mainP1: Under our R&D domain, we heavily invest in our research & development fundamentals to continuously improve our products, utilizing indigenous resources and exploring new material chemistry to develop standard yet world-class products. Our commitment to innovation drives us to push the boundaries of what's possible in moisture control technology.
RDPage.mainP2: Moreover, we are focused on developing new products by addressing today's complex problems and transforming them into pragmatic solutions. Our R&D team works tirelessly to ensure that every product we develop not only meets international standards but also exceeds customer expectations in performance, reliability, and sustainability.
RDPage.mainP3: Through strategic investment in research infrastructure and a culture of continuous improvement, we maintain our position as a leader in moisture protection solutions while contributing to Pakistan's technological advancement.
RDPage.philosophy: Transforming Complex Problems into Pragmatic Solutions
RDPage.focusAreasDesc: Our research and development efforts span multiple domains, ensuring comprehensive innovation across all aspects of our product portfolio
RDPage.focus1Desc: Continuously enhancing our existing product line through rigorous testing, performance analysis, and customer feedback integration to deliver superior moisture control solutions.
RDPage.focus2Desc: Exploring advanced material chemistry and innovative formulations to develop cutting-edge desiccant technologies that meet and exceed international standards.
RDPage.focus3Desc: Leveraging local resources and materials to create cost-effective, sustainable solutions while supporting domestic supply chains and reducing import dependencies.
RDPage.focus4Desc: Addressing complex industry challenges by developing innovative products that transform problems into pragmatic, real-world solutions for our customers.
RDPage.focus5Desc: Maintaining world-class quality standards through comprehensive testing protocols in our EU-grade environmental chamber, ensuring reliability under extreme conditions.
RDPage.focus6Desc: Building a robust innovation pipeline that anticipates future market needs and develops next-generation solutions for emerging challenges in cargo protection.
RDPage.capabilitiesDesc: State-of-the-art facilities and methodologies that enable breakthrough innovations
RDPage.capability1Desc: EU-grade environmental chamber for simulating real-world shipping conditions
RDPage.capability2Desc: Quick iteration cycles to transform ideas into market-ready products
RDPage.capability3Desc: Systematic approach to converting complex challenges into practical solutions
RDPage.processDesc: From ideation to market launch, our systematic approach ensures that every product we develop addresses real-world challenges with practical, effective solutions.
RDPage.step1Desc: Identify market needs and technical challenges
RDPage.step3Desc: Rigorous quality assurance and performance validation
RDPage.achievement1Desc: Our environmental chamber enables real-time simulation of extreme shipping conditions, ensuring product reliability.
RDPage.achievement2Desc: Regular product enhancements based on field performance data and customer feedback drive our innovation cycle.
RDPage.achievement3Desc: Successfully developing world-class products using local resources, contributing to Pakistan's technological independence.
RDPage.partnerDesc: Have a specific challenge or need? Our R&D team is ready to collaborate and develop custom solutions tailored to your requirements.
